card.name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
card.property: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

card.name: Beacon of Tomorrows
card.property: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

card.name: Deep-Sea Kraken
card.property: Deep-Sea Kraken can't be blocked. Suspend 9—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with nine time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if Deep-Sea Kraken is suspended, remove a time counter from it.

card.name: Mind's Desire
card.property: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.) Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Peer Through Depths
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Quicken
card.property: The next sorcery card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

card.name: Reach Through Mists
card.property: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you."—Lady Azami

card.name: Sage-Eye Avengers
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Sage-Eye Avengers attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if its power is less than Sage-Eye Avengers's power.

card.name: Sift Through Sands
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card. If you've cast a spell named Peer Through Depths and a spell named Reach Through Mists this turn, you may search your library for a card named The Unspeakable, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Snap
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't matter if the mind or body cracks first. They both have to go.

card.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

card.name: Temporal Fissure
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: The Unspeakable
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever The Unspeakable deals combat damage to a player, you may return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rumors are horrifying; the truth is worse.

card.name: Desperate Ritual
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Empty the Warrens
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Grapeshot
card.property: Grapeshot deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages often seek to emulate the powerful relics lost to time and apocalypse.

card.name: Rift Bolt
card.property: Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Shivan Meteor
card.property: Shivan Meteor deals 13 damage to target creature. Suspend 2—{1}{R}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R}{R} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Volcanic Vision
card.property: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

card.name: Firemind's Foresight
card.property: Search your library for an instant card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with converted mana costs 2 and 1. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

card.name: Jori En, Ruin Diver
card.property: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some relic hunters have given up exploring and gone to fight the Eldrazi. But I know our work is more important than ever. The secrets we uncover could lead to the world's salvation."

card.name: Nivix Cyclops
card.property: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Nivix Cyclops gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Spellheart Chimera
card.property: Flying, trample Spellheart Chimera's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.

card.name: Nucklavee
card.property: When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target red sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target blue instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It loathes all tastes but two: spells and flesh.

card.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
card.property: Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped. When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Lovisa Coldeyes
card.property: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A massacre? It is a mercy we grant them. This way they won't freeze to death."

card.name: Beacon of Destruction
card.property: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.property: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Firebolt
card.property: Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

card.name: Kamahl, Pit Fighter
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) {T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

card.name: Kruin Striker
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Kruin Striker gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unhappy with the creation of the wolfir, Rorica broke with her order and led a crusade against the "reformed werewolves."

card.name: Zo-Zu the Punisher
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Zo-Zu the Punisher deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Ambassador Oak
card.property: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

card.name: Beast Attack
card.property: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Flashback {2}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Call of the Herd
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cloudcrown Oak
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Clever folk build their homes near cloudcrowns. If a hawk or even just a faerie tries to swoop in, it'll get swatted from here to Cloverdell."—Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

card.name: Increasing Savagery
card.property: Put five +1/+1 counters on target creature. If Increasing Savagery was cast from a graveyard, put ten +1/+1 counters on that creature instead. Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

card.name: Roar of the Wurm
card.property: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Skarrgan Pit-Skulk
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

card.name: Sylvan Might
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Talara's Battalion
card.property: Trample Cast Talara's Battalion only if you've cast another green spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The safewright Talara protects a delicate woodland waterfall. She has vowed to send wave after wave of warriors to slay any who would dare disturb its beauty.

card.name: Radha, Heir to Keld
card.property: Whenever Radha, Heir to Keld attacks, you may add {R}{R} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Run home, cur. I've already taken your master's head. Don't make me thrash you with it."

card.name: Relentless Hunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I swore to take one head for each member of my family they killed. My task is nowhere near its end."

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.property: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

card.name: Guttural Response
card.property: Counter target blue instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A savage cry with the power to shatter minds.

card.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
card.property: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust."—Nikya of the Old Ways

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A banner for bonds of blood or belief.

card.name: Rugged Highlands
card.property: Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped. When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.property: G

card.name: Forest
card.property: G
